items.title: Stripe & Printful Merchandise Store
items.description: Web store with stripe payment processing. Items on the website can be pulled directly from Printful, a droppshipper with customizable merchandise (apparel, greeting cards, etc.)

items.title: Friendify
items.description: Spotify app for sharing music taste. Pulls in top Spotify items for a user. Users can generate shareable links for others to join and compare top items. Mobile-friendly and able to play spotify previews in-app. You'll need to get approved with Spotify to use it so just email me if you'd like to test it out.

items.title: Gemini Trading Bot
items.description: Built a trading system for the gemini crypto exchange. Only made one strategy which wasn't profitable but definitely want to return to it in the future and build a testing system to develop strategies.
